parrafo1: Master explained that the party learned the facts of which the mayor is accused at the beginning of last week for the victim's story and immediately hired an expert on sexist violence to know the version of all parties . A work that concluded in a report sent to the party at 7 pm on Tuesday, at which time the formation decided to request the immediate resignation of Pablo Soto before the forcefulness of the facts.
